conbody.p: On Windows, double-click on the MiramoDITA-OTpluginpNNNsetup.exe and navigate to the DITA-OT install root folder. If the target DITA-OT folder already contains an instance of the , com.miramo.mmpdf, the installer will automatically uninstall the existing com.miramo.mmpdf plugin from the DITA-OT plugins folder, and existing configuration files and XSL stylesheets in the com.miramo.mmpdf folder will be overwritten. If you wish to install multiple versions of the plugin, navigate to a different DITA-OT folder and choose to proceed without uninstalling the previous version when prompted.

If you have made changes to the 'default.mfd' template file located in the com.miramo.mmpdf\mmtemplates folder, the installer will make a backup copy of the 'default.mfd' to 'default-pre<vs>mfd', where <vs> is the version being installed for example p099. Any other MFD files located in the mmtemplates folder will be left unchanged.
For all other platforms, remove the com.miramo.mmpdf folder from the target DITA-OT plugins folder and install the new version as described
conbody.note: Once the installation has completed, upgrade any existing MFD files by following the instructions given below.
